Text: i am stuck at 99.88 percent. anyone else with this problem?
You can't play it unless you active the game through EA. :/ Might as well go buy the game.
what are the instructions for downloading and installing the game

OK I figured it out. Copy the dragonage2.exe from the crack folder into:
Contents>Resources>Transgaming>C_drive>Program Files>Dragon Age> bin_ship
This should disable the activation process and allow you to play the game perfectly. I did not update it so I am not sure if it will work if you do. Hope this helps anyone having problems
Thanks thenoobish, you're probably the best contributor to the mac gaming community on the pirate bay!
